00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <cusp/detail/config.h>
00024 #include <cusp/gallery/stencil.h>
00025 
00026 #ifdef _WIN32
00027 #define _USE_MATH_DEFINES 1  // make sure M_PI is defined
00028 #endif
00029 #include <math.h>
00030 
00031 namespace cusp
00032 {
00033 
00034 namespace gallery
00035 {
00036 
00042 struct disc_type {};
00043 
00044 struct FD : public disc_type {};
00045 struct FE : public disc_type {};
00046 
00060 template <typename Method, typename MatrixType>
00061 void diffusion( MatrixType& matrix, size_t m, size_t n, 
00062                 const double eps = 1e-5, 
00063                 const double theta = M_PI/4.0)
00064 {
00065         typedef typename MatrixType::index_type IndexType;
00066         typedef typename MatrixType::value_type ValueType;
00067         typedef thrust::tuple<IndexType,IndexType>    StencilIndex;
00068         typedef thrust::tuple<StencilIndex,ValueType> StencilPoint;
00069 
00070         ValueType C = cos(theta);
00071         ValueType S = sin(theta);
00072         ValueType CC = C*C;
00073         ValueType SS = S*S;
00074         ValueType CS = C*S;
00075 
00076         ValueType a;
00077         ValueType b;
00078         ValueType c;
00079         ValueType d;
00080         ValueType e;
00081 
00082         if( thrust::detail::is_same<Method, FE>::value )
00083         {
00084                 a = (-1.0*eps - 1.0)*CC + (-1.0*eps - 1.0)*SS + ( 3.0*eps - 3.0)*CS;
00085                 b = ( 2.0*eps - 4.0)*CC + (-4.0*eps + 2.0)*SS;
00086                 c = (-1.0*eps - 1.0)*CC + (-1.0*eps - 1.0)*SS + (-3.0*eps + 3.0)*CS;
00087                 d = (-4.0*eps + 2.0)*CC + ( 2.0*eps - 4.0)*SS;
00088                 e = ( 8.0*eps + 8.0)*CC + ( 8.0*eps + 8.0)*SS;
00089 
00090                 a /= 6.0;
00091                 b /= 6.0;
00092                 c /= 6.0;
00093                 d /= 6.0;
00094                 e /= 6.0;
00095         }
00096         else if( thrust::detail::is_same<Method, FD>::value )
00097         {
00098                 a = 0.5 * (eps-1.0) * CS;
00099                 b = -(eps*SS + CC); 
00100                 c = -a;
00101                 d = -(eps*CC + SS);
00102                 e = 2.0 * (eps+1.0);
00103         }
00104         else
00105         {
00106                 throw cusp::invalid_input_exception("unrecognized discretization method");
00107         }
00108 
00109         cusp::array1d<StencilPoint, cusp::host_memory> stencil;
00110 
00111         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( -1, -1), a));
00112         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0, -1), b));
00113         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  1, -1), c));
00114         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( -1,  0), d));
00115         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0,  0), e));
00116         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  1,  0), d));
00117         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( -1,  1), c));
00118         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0,  1), b));
00119         stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  1,  1), a));
00120 
00121         cusp::gallery::generate_matrix_from_stencil(matrix, stencil, StencilIndex(m,n));
00122 }
00126 } // end namespace gallery
00127 } // end namespace cusp
